abstract: World governing body for swimming, in response to article in The Times of London, promises to investigate charges of doping by members of Russian national swim team.

headline.main: More Doping Accusations Face Russian Swimmers

snippet: Swimming’s world governing body, known as FINA, promised to investigate new allegations of Russian doping if they could be substantiated.
lead_paragraph: Swimming’s world governing body, known as FINA, promised to investigate new allegations of Russian doping if they could be substantiated.
